Cristiano Ronaldo scored the 58th hat-trick of his career on Tuesday night.
FIFTY-EIGHT hat-tricks.
That’s 174 goals simply in hat-tricks.
ENTER GIVEAWAY
Luxembourg were the sorry victims this ti… [+2989 chars]
